instruction: Identify a person who fits the given criteria.
output: Greta Thunberg is a world-renowned climate change scientist and a leading voice among activists for action to combat climate change. A Swedish environmental activist and the founder of the “Fridays for Future” movement, she has become one of the most recognizable faces of the fight against climate change. Through her speeches, she has raised global awareness of the current climate emergency, inspiring millions of people across the world to join the global conversation.
